017package org.spongepowered.configurate.transformation;
018
019import org.checkerframework.checker.nullness.qual.NonNull;
020import org.spongepowered.configurate.ConfigurationNode;
021import org.spongepowered.configurate.ScopedConfigurationNode;
022
023import java.util.Arrays;
024import java.util.SortedMap;
025import java.util.TreeMap;
026
027/**
028 * Represents a set of transformations on a configuration.
029 */
030public abstract class ConfigurationTransformation<T extends ConfigurationNode> {
031
032    /**
033     * A special object that represents a wildcard in a path provided to a configuration transformer
034     */
035    public static final Object WILDCARD_OBJECT = new Object();
036
037    /**
038     * Create a new builder to create a basic configuration transformation.
039     *
040     *
041     * @param <T> the type of node being processed
042     * @return a new transformation builder.
043     */
044    @NonNull
045    public static <T extends ScopedConfigurationNode<T>> Builder<T> builder() {
046        return new Builder<>();
047    }
048
049    /**
050     * This creates a builder for versioned transformations.
051     *
052     * @param <T> the type of node being processed
053     * @return A new builder for versioned transformations
054     */
055    @NonNull
056    public static <T extends ConfigurationNode> VersionedBuilder<T> versionedBuilder() {
057        return new VersionedBuilder<>();
058    }
059
060    /**
061     * Creates a chain of {@link ConfigurationTransformation}s.
062     *
063     * @param <T> the type of node being processed
064     * @param transformations The transformations
065     * @return The resultant transformation chain
066     */
067    @NonNull
068    public static <T extends ConfigurationNode> ConfigurationTransformation<T> chain(ConfigurationTransformation<? super T>... transformations) {
069        return new ChainedConfigurationTransformation<>(transformations);
070    }
071
072    /**
073     * Apply this transformation to a given node
074     *
075     * @param node The target node
076     */
077    public abstract void apply(@NonNull T node);
078
079    /**
080     * Builds a basic {@link ConfigurationTransformation}.
081     */
082    public static final class Builder<T extends ScopedConfigurationNode<T>> {
083        private MoveStrategy strategy = MoveStrategy.OVERWRITE;
084        private final SortedMap<Object[], TransformAction<? super T>> actions;
085
086        protected Builder() {
087            this.actions = new TreeMap<>(new NodePathComparator());
088        }
089
090        /**
091         * Adds an action to the transformation.
092         *
093         * @param path The path to apply the action at
094         * @param action The action
095         * @return This builder (for chaining)
096         */
097        @NonNull
098        public Builder<T> addAction(Object[] path, TransformAction<? super T> action) {
099            actions.put(path, action);
100            return this;
101        }
102
103        /**
104         * Gets the move strategy to be used by the resultant transformation.
105         *
106         * @return The move strategy
107         */
108        @NonNull
109        public MoveStrategy getMoveStrategy() {
110            return strategy;
111        }
112
113        /**
114         * Sets the mode strategy to be used by the resultant transformation.
115         *
116         * @param strategy The strategy
117         * @return This builder (for chaining)
118         */
119        @NonNull
120        public Builder<T> setMoveStrategy(@NonNull MoveStrategy strategy) {
121            this.strategy = strategy;
122            return this;
123        }
124
125        /**
126         * Builds the transformation.
127         *
128         * @return The transformation
129         */
130        @NonNull
131        public ConfigurationTransformation<T> build() {
132            return new SingleConfigurationTransformation<>(actions, strategy);
133        }
134    }
135
136    /**
137     * Builds a versioned {@link ConfigurationTransformation}.
138     */
139    public static final class VersionedBuilder<T extends ConfigurationNode> {
140        private Object[] versionKey = new Object[] {"version"};
141        private final SortedMap<Integer, ConfigurationTransformation<? super T>> versions = new TreeMap<>();
142
143        protected VersionedBuilder() {}
144
145        /**
146         * Sets the path of the version key within the configuration.
147         *
148         * @param versionKey The path to the version key
149         * @return This builder (for chaining)
150         */
151        @NonNull
152        public VersionedBuilder<T> setVersionKey(@NonNull Object... versionKey) {
153            this.versionKey = Arrays.copyOf(versionKey, versionKey.length, Object[].class);
154            return this;
155        }
156
157        /**
158         * Adds a transformation to this builder for the given version.
159         *
160         * @param version The version
161         * @param transformation The transformation
162         * @return This builder (for chaining)
163         */
164        @NonNull
165        public VersionedBuilder<T> addVersion(int version, @NonNull ConfigurationTransformation<? super T> transformation) {
166            versions.put(version, transformation);
167            return this;
168        }
169
170        /**
171         * Builds the transformation.
172         *
173         * @return The transformation
174         */
175        @NonNull
176        public ConfigurationTransformation<T> build() {
177            return new VersionedTransformation<>(versionKey, versions);
178        }
179    }
180}
